components.name: 1-hexyl-2-ethyl-3,5-dimethylpyridinium 1,1,1-trifluoro-N-[(trifluoromethyl)sulfonyl]methanesulfonamide
sample: 99 mass %;0.0461 water mass %(dried by vacuum heating;solvent extraction)

ref.full: Verdia, P.; Hernaiz, M.; Gonzalez, E. J.; Macedo, E. A.; Salgado, J.; Tojo, E. (2014) J. Chem. Thermodyn. 69, 19-26.
